author: Ania Bessonov,Amil Niazi
title: Are your groceries and food deliveries safe? Your daily COVID-19 questions answered
description: We're breaking down what you need to know about the pandemic by answering your questions. You can send us your questions via email at COVID@cbc.ca and we’ll answer as many as we can.
content:
We're breaking down what you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic by answering your questions. You can send us your questions via email at COVID@cbc.ca
